abstract: Despite bright spots among newer, small cars, overall vehicle sales in the United States plummeted during the month as gas prices climbed to record highs.
snippet: Despite bright spots among newer, small cars, overall vehicle sales in the United States plummeted during the month as gas prices climbed to record highs.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  Automakers reported higher sales of small cars as oil and gasoline prices climbed to record highs in April, but said Thursday that overall vehicle sales in the United States plummeted during the month.

headline.main: Automakers’ April Sales Reflect Shift to Smaller Cars
headline.print_headline: April Sales Reflect Shift to Smaller Cars
